text: Belgium were represented by Hooverphonic (Geike Arnaet, Alex Callier and Raymond Geerts) in Eurovision Song Contest 2021 with their song "The Wrong Place". They were the oldest representatives in the contest. They placed 9th in their Semi Final and 19th Overall. They were selected by VRT for the 2020 Contest that was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. At the time the group also had Luka Cruysberghs in the group as lead singer before being replaced by Geike for the 2021 Contest. Category:Countries in the Eurovision Song Contest Category:2021 in music Eurovision Category:Belgian culture
title: Belgium in the Eurovision Song Contest 2021
